description:
The Moseley Collins Law Firm has an office in Folsom, California, from which we provide invaluable counsel and support to clients throughout Sacramento County and beyond who are suffering needlessly as the result of another party's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

Regarded as one of our region's premier law firms for all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, we have additional offices in Sacramento and Seattle, Washington. During our time in practice, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients adversely affected by motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, slip-and-fall accidents and other preventable tragedies.

Backed by their more than 40 years of combined legal experience, our lawyers possess the extensive knowledge and resources necessary to help you make the best-informed decisions regarding the legal challenges you face. Strong in our faith, we genuinely care about the legal issues affecting your life and livelihood. We promise to treat you as a member of our own family as we fight hard to help you obtain the favorable results you seek and the justice you deserve.

Honored for our remarkable professionalism, our lawyers have earned Top 100 Trial Lawyer designations from the National Trial Lawyers along with many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers. Perhaps more importantly, we have also received Superb ratings on Avvo as well as dozens of testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients.

To find out more about how we can best serve your needs here at the Moseley Collins Law Firm, you can contact our office to schedule a free initial consultation. We also currently offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you and your family members safe and healthy.
